Azimuth.app.welcomebox: div( h3(HTML("Please upload a dataset to map to our human kidney reference")), "Upload a counts matrix from a single-cell or single-nucleus RNA-seq dataset of human kidney in one of the following formats: hdf5, rds, h5ad, h5seurat. For testing, we also provide a demo dataset of 10,928 human kidney cells from ",a("Stewart et al, 2019", href="https://science.sciencemag.org/content/365/6460/1461", target="_blank")," (10x Genomics v2; scRNAseq), which is loaded automatically with the 'Load demo dataset' button or available for download ", a("here.", href="https://zenodo.org/record/3969339", target="blank"), width = 12 )
Azimuth.app.refdescriptor: This reference consists of 64,693 kidney cells (10x Genomics snRNA-seq) from 21 samples across 13 patient donors. Samples were derived from nephrectomy, biopsy, or deceased donor tissue, spanning three anatomical regions: medulla, cortex and papilla.
